diagnosis.final_diagnosis: PHACES syndrome with giant fusiform internal carotid artery aneurysm
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis of an incomplete phenotypic expression of PHACES syndrome was established based on the coexistence of a facial hemangioma, orbital hemangioma, diffuse angiodysplasia of the intracranial vessels, and a giant aneurysm, alongside the patient's family history of aneurysms.
